title: All These Fools Crying About URF Not Being Here
body:
Even though Riot has stated MULTIPLE TIMES it won't be on April 1st, but instead we will get it more than once per year. Also that we will have URF for more days in total than normal.

Riot finally made this Draven meme come true and everyone is just crying about it. The only people that like it are Draven mains even thought it's a fun joke for everyone. Seriously, grow up.

replies.body: All these fools crying about fools crying about URF.
they said we would get urf for less then half the time we got it before.

Actually it's the complete opposite. If you think about how many weeks there are in a year and how many special game modes there are, we'd actually get URF much more. I don't supposed you have any evidence either.

tbh i don't mind the event it is kinda fun but granted the lag an bug outs are a tad bit annoying but atleast riot gave us something instead of doing absolutely nothing like they could have done o.o{{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}
Can't wait to see all the angry people feel so dumb when they release it April 2nd.
TY i'll be posting this everywhere now.
